title: baiyirO baiyirO
sahitya:
baiyirO baiyirO manamuTTi baiyirO


anupallavi

  cennAgi baidenna dhanyana mADirO


caraNam 1    avaru ivaru baidarembo hIna buddhi nanagilla 
nA mADidaSTu pApavannu aLedu hAki hanci koLLirO
    caraNam 2    iruve noNa konda pApa matte hariyara nuDida pApa 
kartu shrI purandara viTalanna cittadalli neneyada pApa
